### RFP: Vertical Autoclave
### Contract ID: 22-58058
### Published Date: January 27th, 2023
### Closing Date: March 8, 2023 at 14:00:00

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The **National Research Council Canada** is soliciting proposals from pre-qualified suppliers for the acquisition of a Vertical Autoclave as part of the Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI.

**Scope of Work**

The successful supplier will provide a Vertical Autoclave that meets the following mandatory technical requirements:

* Vertical autoclave (top-loading)
* Internal capacity of 80 liters to hold and sterilize two 3L Erlenmeyer flasks with media
* Electrical connection as the only utility connection
* Integrated temperature probe(s)
* At least four validated cycles for glass, plastics, liquid media, and liquid waste
* Mobile and relocatable within the facility as needed
* Minimal floor space requirements (5 square feet)
* Canadian Registration Number (CRN) certification for a pressure vessel
* Additional accessories for a fully functional autoclave (basket, stand, cleaning tablets, etc.)
* CSA-approved or equivalent certification

**Documents and Compliance**

The successful supplier must provide one complete set of documentation, including technical specifications, installation requirements, and operating instructions. The supplier will also be required to provide a parts and labor warranty for a minimum of two years after delivery.

**Delivery Point**

The Vertical Autoclave will be delivered to the National Research Council at 35 Regis Duffy Drive, Charlottetown, PEI C1E 0K5.

**Questions and Submissions**

Any questions or requests should be directed to Katie Homuth, Contracting Officer, at Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca. Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.
